pullRequest.body: Classifies by adding issue number (#10688) to porting notes claiming `ext/simp lemma was not necessary`.

nodes.body: As these are `simp` or `ext` lemmas, I would think that it could be classified together with "added to ease automation" https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/issues/10688 (cf. PR #10689 )

Hi @joelriou, thank you for your review. 

Could you please discuss your proposal [here](https://leanprover.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/287929-mathlib4/topic/Addressing.20porting.20notes.3F) in order to reach a consensus?

Pull request successfully merged into master.
